K12D0636=D0876_H0615:68b-1: a'arya kha garbha aashto tta ra sha ta ka n'a ma dh'a ra n'i mantra sa hi ta /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:68b-3: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:68b-4: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhal ras rgya che
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:68b-5: zhing spyan gyis 'od 'phro bas nam mkha'i dkyil dri
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:68b-6: zhim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-0: nam mkha'i spyod yul can sa'i @69a *//
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-1: dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-2: aom svasti ka m'a lakshi bi pu la sambha ba /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-3: dharma dh'u tu go tsa ra sv'a h'a /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-4: gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad ni //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-7: rnga bo che dag gi sgra yang grags par gyur /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-8: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba yin no //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-10: kye 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa'i sems can
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-11: rnams nam mkha'i snying po dkyil 'khor mngon sum pa
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-12: rnams kyi sv'a h'a'i mchog gi gzungs //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-13: 'byung bar shin tu dka' ba; bsod nams chen po /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-14: sdig pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-15: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ma /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-16: rin po che'i phung por gyur pa 'di nyon cig dang /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-17: 'di thos pas dri ma med par 'gyur zhing legs
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-18: par khrus byas par 'gyur la shin tu rnam par
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-20: padma lta bur 'gyur te; 'khor ba'i 'dam gyis mi gos so //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69a-22: sems can thams cad snang bar byed do //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69b-0: sems can thams @69b cad rab tu sim par byed do //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69b-2: ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi gos so //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69b-4: mtho dman med do; ;lhun po lta bur 'gyur te /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69b-5: sems can thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69b-7: bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos so //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69b-8: de la sogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrangs pa
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69b-9: tshad med grangs med pa dag thob par 'gyur te
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69b-15: bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis gang ci yang rung ste /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69b-18: re ba de dag grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69b-19: bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis kyang char ches pa dang /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69b-31: mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su srung bar byed pa /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69b-35: ci la dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:69b-36: de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis ha ha zhes ca co dang /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-0: @70a *// ga zha bton te sgra ring zhes byas nas gos
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-1: dang rgyan sna tshogs bskyod de snying nas phyag 'tshal
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-2: nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbang byed
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-3: pa 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-4: brgyad pa'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho'i bstod pa yang dag
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-5: par brjod pa / nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum sems can mchog /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-6: 'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtsho mnga'//
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-7: sems can dag pa bla med rin chen mchog /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-8: thar pa'i sa bon 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-9: kun mkhyen tshul mkhyen legs dang legs min mkhyen //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-10: thar mkhyen chos mkhyen bde dang mi bde mkhyen //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-11: lam mkhyen gces mkhyen dge dang mi dge mkhyen //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-12: dus mkhyen dge mkhyen stobs dang /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-14: 'gro mchog chos mchog sems can yon tan mchog /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-15: lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul min mchog /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-16: rgyan mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang mi 'dzin mchog /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-17: dag mchog rtogs mchog mchog dang mchog min mchog /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-18: zhi rab snying rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-19: 'od rab thar pa'i rab ste rten gyi rab //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70a-20: rgya rab sngags kyi rab ste thugs brtse'i rab //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-0: mnyam rab sems @70b can rab ste gsum rig rab //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-1: legs sgron mchog sgron stobs dang stobs min sgron //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-2: thar sgron rigs sgron rgyal dang rgyal min sgron //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-3: dge sgron gzi sgron nor bu'i 'od kyi sgron //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-4: rgyu skar zla ba'i rgyan las shar ba'i sgron //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-5: mchog 'od yon tan kun gyi 'od zer 'od //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-6: legs 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten gyi 'od //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-7: 'od chen gti mug rab tu 'byed pa'i 'od //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-9: rdo rje'i dbang po 'dren dbang sems can dbang //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-10: rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgyan dbang po //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-11: rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun tshad med dbang //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-12: dpa' bo rig sngags 'chang dbang srid gsum dbang //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-13: rdo rje bzang po rngo 'od rdo rje 'bar //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-15: rdo rje 'od can rdo 'dzin rdo rje drag /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-16: rdo rje rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog dbang //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-17: na bza' sngo zhing sku yi cha lugs sngo //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-18: sku mdog sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'od kyis brgyan //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-19: ral gri rno 'jebs sngo zhing brtan pa bsnams //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-20: mkha' sngo gzhal med khang 'bar nang na bzhugs //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-21: lha zhal dri med shin tu mi bzad 'bar; ;rab tu drag la 'od zer 'phro zhing 'gyur //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-22: sdig sel rdul ltar 'khrul byed phreng mchog can //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:70b-23: klog gi stobs kyis snang bas sgeg la brtan //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-1: mtshon thogs dbang ldan mthu stobs mtshon //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-2: rdo rje'i mtshon thogs mda' dang mdung thung 'jigs //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-3: 'khor lo'i mtshon thogs bcibs pa ri dang 'khrul //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-4: gsal zhing mtshon thogs bgegs kyi stobs 'joms pa //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-5: bde 'byung 'jig rten gsum bdag rdo rje'i dbyug /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-6: sku rnams thams cad nyi ma'i 'od kyis brgyan //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-7: grags pa'i rigs su byung bas rgyal po mdzad //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-8: mu tig phreng bas sgeg cing mdzes par bgyis //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-9: sku mdzes brnyes shing phun sum tshogs pa brnyes //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-10: rab 'byams mchog brnyes sa la 'jug pa brnyes //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-11: mthu stobs lhag pa brnyes shing grub brnyes la //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-12: rig pa gsum gyi stobs brnyes mthu brnyes pa //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-14: cha lugs gsal mchog dar ba chen po 'dren //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-15: byams 'dren nyi ma 'dren cing skye rgu 'dren //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-16: legs 'dren zhing gi stobs 'dren snying rje can //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-17: dri med cha lugs gsal ba cha lugs 'bar //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-18: rnam grangs sgeg pas grags pa'i ba dan can //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-19: 'gro ba'i skyabs 'byed 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyen //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71a-20: longs spyod gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-0: sku dmar sku mthon sku @71b mdzes sku bzang ba //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-1: sku ser sku dkar dar ba chen po'i sku //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-2: sku rol rdo rje'i sku mnga' spyan legs sku //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-3: rigs sku rig sngags 'chang ba rin chen bsnams //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-4: gtsug gi nor bu gtsug can cod pan mchog /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-5: cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-6: dpal 'dzin rin chen dam pa 'chang ba'i mchog /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-7: sngags bzhi phyag rgya 'chang ba phun sum tshogs //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-8: rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu rgyu //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-9: srid gsum nyi ma gcig pu 'od stong mnga'//
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-10: ri rtser 'char ba bdal legs bkra shis pa; ;yon tan mthu stobs khyad par rnam par grags //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-11: nor bu chen po nor sdug nor bu'i 'od //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-12: nyi ma'i nor bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-13: yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun mgon gcig pu //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-14: nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu gcig snang ba //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-15: sems can rnam dag yangs shing rnam par grags //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-16: srid gsum srung ma gcig pu rgyal sras mchog /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-17: zhi ba rab tu zhi ba skyabs 'os rtag /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-18: skye rgu'i bdag po pad 'byung padma skyes //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-19: kun nas 'od bzang legs bshad chos mnga' ba //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-20: dar ba legs bshad rab dul legs bshad phyad [?]//
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-21: blo bzang 'od bzang bde ldan skye gnas bzang //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:71b-22: mkhas rab zhi rab mchog gi chos dang ldan //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-2: 'od kyi 'byung gnas bde mdzad dbang du mdzad //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-3: legs 'byung shes rab 'byung gnas stobs bskyed pa //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-4: snying rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grangs mdzad //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-5: rnam grol nges grol shin tu grol ba'i blo //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-6: blo yangs par ni bkram zhing rnam par grags //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-7: kun tu longs spyod sgo ste bla yi mchog /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-8: blo gros brtan pa dkon mchog gsum las bsgrubs //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-9: sangs rgyas padma mda' rgyas 'dra ba'i zhal //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-10: dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid du 'thad //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-11: snying po gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-12: ngo bo nyid kyi rgyun brnyes rab gsal ba //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-13: spyan zur mda' ni rab dul gtad legs pa //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-14: 'jigs med zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-15: mdung thung brgya yi mtshon mchog mtshon cha rdzogs //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-16: drag po 'jigs pa sdig sel gsum las skyes //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-17: rab dul mkhas pa 'grogs dga' 'dris pa sla //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-18: rab tu drag ba gnyen rab gser mdog can //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-19: lha chen bde byed gsal shing phyag na bsnams //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-20: spyan gsum rig pa gsum ldan me gsum sel; ;'od bzang me tog mtshon thogs me tog mnga'//
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72a-21: na bza' bzang mnabs [?] g-yas 'phen tshabs cher 'phen //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-0: legs bris sna tshogs mtshon cha sna @72b tshogs mnga'//
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-1: na bza' sna tshogs sna tshogs rgyan gyi dpal //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-2: zhal ras zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-3: zhal mdangs bstan pas 'jig rten kun 'byor mdzad //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-4: bzhad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs mnga'//
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-5: zhal mdangs rgya mtsho gsal mdzad lam me ba //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-6: dbang chen rdo rje'i thog legs 'jigs pa'i sgra //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-7: rdo rje drag po nor bu g-yo ba 'dzin //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-8: sgra snyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-9: blo gros chen po blo gros rna ba'i mchog /
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-10: rgyan 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chen zhal dang ldan //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-11: rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba kun gyi gnas //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa mgon sras phreng ba bzang //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-13: stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-14: skye rgu'i bdag po bka' lung mnyam zhing brtags //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-15: mi yi mnga' bdag mtho ris skyed pa'i rgyu //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-16: sgyu 'dra 'dod pa'i mda' dang rdo rje can //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-17: mthu stobs mnga' zhing spyan bzang sdug par ldan //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-18: ston pa bzang po stong nyid lam gyi stegs //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-19: gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la 'jug par mdzad //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-20: brtan po rgyu la rab tu nges gyur pa //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-21: dkyil 'khor dam pa kun gyi slob dpon lags //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-22: gcig pu skye rgu'i dkyil 'khor cho ga mkhyen //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:72b-23: rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nas skyes //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-1: brnyes shing sa bcur legs par gnas //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-2: gnas chen son pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-3: skye rgu rnams kyi nyon mongs sel ba dang //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-4: sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-5: bde gshegs sras mchog su zhig 'don byed pa //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-6: 'jig rten zla ba gcig shar bzhin du snang //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-7: nam mkha'i snying po sems can gcig pu yi //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-8: mdun 'dug nang bar bstod pa 'di brjod yang //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-9: de ni srid gsum sems can mchog 'gyur zhing //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-10: dri ma'i gnas kun las kyang thar par 'gyur //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-11: g-yul dang 'thab rtsod shin tu mi bzad dang //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-12: mu ge'i gnod pa mi nad byung ba na //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-13: mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs dad skyes nas //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-14: nam mkha'i snying po la ni bstod byed pa //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-15: de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-16: sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnams las grol; ;des ni zhi mchog mchog bde kun gnas dang //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-17: bde ba rgya chen nges par thob par 'gyur //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-18: bde 'thob longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba'am //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-19: rgyal srid 'thob dang byad gzugs nor 'thob dang //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-20: rigs 'thob yon tan kun gyi gzhi bsgrub phyir //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73a-21: bton na 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73b-0: de phyir ci ste rtag tu @73b 'dod bde kun //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73b-1: 'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' ba //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73b-2: nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum mgon po la //
K12D0636=D0876_H0615:73b-3: rtag tu brtan cing sngags kyang brtan par bgyi //
